TEXT: A craven vintner climbing the spire to find a victual that will finally NL satisfy his twisted tastes.
NL You aim carefully at all the vitals you can see.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~devouring~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

#rGUILT. NL NL #r~Monster.~ #r~Murderer.~ #r~Man-Eater.~ The names you thought of yourself bit deep, but no matter how deep it was @never@ enough to shake you off your twisted addictions. You managed to ~steel~ yourself, to put the ~mask~ back on, and keep playing the ~game.~ You didn't think there was ~anything~ that could really shake you from your avarice. NL NL #p"What #pdo #pthey #ptaste #plike, #pdad?"
